price: 23. Kuwa ku sheega (zino) dumarka dhawrsoon mu’minaatka ah, ee moog oo ka war la’ (xumo oo dhan)12, waa lagu nacladay adduun iyo aakhiraba, waxayna mudan cadaab daran.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ ٱلۡغَٰفِلَٰتِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ لُعِنُواْ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: 12. Waxaa loola jeedaa mu’minaatka moog oo ka war la’ xumaha, mu’minaatka aanay marnaba ku soo dhicin qalbigooda inay falaan wax xun ee iyagu nadiifka ah dhowrsoon.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yarmūna al-muḥ'ṣanāti al-ghāfilāti al-mu'mināti luʿinū fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
